name: Lakkaberry Madame
description: A chopped chicken dish. Said to have gained real popularity in Nod-Krai, despite being an imported recipe. It has a sweet-and-sour flavor that is indeed most delectable. A different flavor, certainly, though judging by the name... was the base dish the Sweet Madame, you wonder?

suspicious.name: Suspicious Lakkaberry Madame
suspicious.description: A chopped chicken dish. The intense sourness wipes away all expectations of a pleasant meal, causing the smile to vanish instantly and the face to scrunch up in discomfort... It tastes less like a dish and more like a prank...
suspicious.effect: Restores 20% of Max HP and an additional 900 HP to the selected character.

normal.name: Lakkaberry Madame
normal.description: A chopped chicken dish. Said to have gained real popularity in Nod-Krai, despite being an imported recipe. It has a sweet-and-sour flavor that is indeed most delectable. A different flavor, certainly, though judging by the name... was the base dish the Sweet Madame, you wonder?
normal.effect: Restores 22% of Max HP and an additional 1,200 HP to the selected character.

delicious.name: Delicious Lakkaberry Madame
delicious.description: A chopped chicken dish. The radiant amber sauce evenly coats every piece of chicken, encasing tender, juicy meat within its sweet, sticky exterior. No matter what it's paired with, this dish is sure to be scarfed down!
delicious.effect: Restores 24% of Max HP and an additional 1,500 HP to the selected character.
